text: The ticket maybe read well and then give correct answers. I have asked several times for a correction and then I answer that the invoice is paid, while I do not ask at all ... Ticket system is worthless, I can only see the header back and not my whole question to PtP, also creating additional tickets when you call is worthless and non value added. Think this is only to raise the ticket numbers of PtP?
title: Very Dissatisfied
